name: session-recorder
description: Browser session recorder for capturing user interactions with Playwright

scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:mcp && npm run build:desktop && npm run build:viewer
scripts.desktop:install: npm run build && cd desktop-app && npm install
scripts.desktop:build: npm run build && cd desktop-app && npm install && npm run electron:build
scripts.desktop:build:win: npm run build && cd desktop-app && npm install && npm run electron:build:win
scripts.desktop:build:mac: npm run build && cd desktop-app && npm install && npm run electron:build:mac
scripts.desktop:build:linux: npm run build && cd desktop-app && npm install && npm run electron:build:linux
scripts.desktop:build:all: npm run build && cd desktop-app && npm install && npm run electron:build:all
scripts.desktop:build:no-voice: npm run build && cd desktop-app && npm install --install-links && rm -rf node_modules/session-recorder/src/voice && npm run electron:build:no-voice
scripts.desktop:build:linux:no-voice: npm run build && cd desktop-app && npm install --install-links && rm -rf node_modules/session-recorder/src/voice && npm run electron:build:linux:no-voice
scripts.desktop:build:win:no-voice: npm run build && cd desktop-app && npm install --install-links && rm -rf node_modules/session-recorder/src/voice && npm run electron:build:win:no-voice
scripts.desktop:build:mac:no-voice: npm run build && cd desktop-app && npm install --install-links && rm -rf node_modules/session-recorder/src/voice && npm run electron:build:mac:no-voice
scripts.typecheck:all: npm run typecheck && npm run typecheck:mcp && npm run typecheck:desktop && npm run typecheck:viewer
scripts.session-recorder:install:windows: npm ci && npm run playwright:install && npm run voice:install:windows
scripts.session-recorder:install:mac-linux: npm ci && npm run playwright:install && npm run voice:install:mac-linux
scripts.voice:install:windows: cd src/voice && python3 -m venv .venv && .venv\Scripts\activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.voice:install:mac-linux: cd src/voice && python3 -m venv .venv && source .venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
